The Boomsday Project.name: Beakered Lightning
The Boomsday Project.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. Overload: (2)
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Working in a shaman's lab, it's important to be well-grounded.

The Boomsday Project.name: Topsy Turvy
The Boomsday Project.text: Swap a minion's Attack and Health.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: "Help! I've fallen and I can't get down!"

The Boomsday Project.name: Autodefense Matrix
The Boomsday Project.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, give it Divine Shield.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: We call it the bubble machine.

The Boomsday Project.name: Biology Project
The Boomsday Project.text: Each player gains 2_Mana Crystals.
The Boomsday Project.flavor:
Step 1: Grow giant evil strawberry.
Step 2: ????
Step 3: Rule Azeroth!

The Boomsday Project.name: Cloning Device
The Boomsday Project.text: Discover a copy of a minion in your opponent's deck.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Zerek got sick of fighting over the remote.

The Boomsday Project.name: Crystallizer
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero. Gain 5 Armor.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: This elf's winning the arms race.

The Boomsday Project.name: Crystology
The Boomsday Project.text:
[x]Draw two 1-Attack
minions from your deck.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: "The Light is neither a particle nor a wave. It's more of a juice, really."

The Boomsday Project.name: Eternium Rover
The Boomsday Project.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain 2_Armor.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: He's all beeps and smiles but you're just a walking pile of armor to him.

The Boomsday Project.name: Faithful Lumi
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +1/+1.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: They're a little light-headed.

The Boomsday Project.name: Floop's Glorious Gloop
The Boomsday Project.text: Whenever a minion dies this turn, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
The Boomsday Project.flavor:
How much gloop could Floop's Gloop gloop if Floop's Gloop
could gloop gloop?

The Boomsday Project.name: Glow-Tron
The Boomsday Project.text: Magnetic
The Boomsday Project.flavor: They tried for weeks to make a stealth version, but eventually decided to just let it glow.

The Boomsday Project.name: Goblin Bomb
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: They're Dr. Boom's babies. His baby boomers.

The Boomsday Project.name: Mecharoo
The Boomsday Project.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Jo-E Bot.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Its project name was KAN-GA. The little one was R-00.

The Boomsday Project.name: Omega Assembly
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Discover a Mech. If you have 10 Mana Crystals, keep all 3 cards.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: They told Dr. Boom he could only pick one. He disagreed.

The Boomsday Project.name: Pogo-Hopper
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each other Pogo-Hopper you played this game.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Once you hop, you just can't stop!

The Boomsday Project.name: Secret Plan
The Boomsday Project.text: Discover a Secret.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: The secret is... There is no plan!

The Boomsday Project.name: Shooting Star
The Boomsday Project.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Literally starstruck.

The Boomsday Project.name: Skaterbot
The Boomsday Project.text: Magnetic Rush
The Boomsday Project.flavor:
"See you later bot"
- Jaina

The Boomsday Project.name: Soul Infusion
The Boomsday Project.text:
Give the
left-most minion in your hand +2/+2.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: People called him a soulless monster. We're not sure this is better.

The Boomsday Project.name: Spirit Bomb
The Boomsday Project.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion and your hero.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Might take a few episodes to power up.

The Boomsday Project.name: Test Subject
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle any spells you cast on this minion into your deck.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: “Now I feel... REALLY icky.”

The Boomsday Project.name: The Soularium
The Boomsday Project.text:
Draw 3 cards.
At the end of your turn, discard them.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Worst field trip ever.

The Boomsday Project.name: Voltaic Burst
The Boomsday Project.text: Summon two 1/1 Sparks with Rush. Overload: (1)
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Batteries have three components: Cathode, Anode, and Overload.

The Boomsday Project.name: Astral Rift
The Boomsday Project.text: Add 2 random minions to your hand.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Let's see what's behind rift number one!

The Boomsday Project.name: Bomb Toss
The Boomsday Project.text: Deal $2 damage. Summon a 0/2 Goblin_Bomb.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Me throw face.

The Boomsday Project.name: Celestial Emissary
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Your next spell_this turn has Spell_Damage +2.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Casting with the stars.

The Boomsday Project.name: Cloakscale Chemist
The Boomsday Project.text: Stealth Divine Shield
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Her suit was fitted using a scale model.

The Boomsday Project.name: Crystalsmith Kangor
The Boomsday Project.text: Divine Shield, Lifesteal Your healing is doubled.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: He wants to tank, but Boom always makes him play support.

The Boomsday Project.name: Cybertech Chip
The Boomsday Project.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Mech to your_hand."
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Goes great with Cyber-Salsa.

The Boomsday Project.name: Dead Ringer
The Boomsday Project.text: Deathrattle: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Shortstop on N'zoth's softball team.

The Boomsday Project.name: Demonic Project
The Boomsday Project.text: Each player transforms a random minion in their hand into a Demon.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Another group project where Jaraxxus doesn't do any work.

The Boomsday Project.name: Dendrologist
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: If you control a Treant, Discover a spell.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: He's teaching his little buddy to talk, but all it says is, "I am Gloop."

The Boomsday Project.name: Elementary Reaction
The Boomsday Project.text: Draw a card. Copy it if_you played an Elemental last turn.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: It's just a Tempest Tantrum.

The Boomsday Project.name: Fireworks Tech
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +1/+1. If it has Deathrattle, trigger it.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: She learns by trial and error.  Mostly error.

The Boomsday Project.name: Galvanizer
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Mechs in your hand by (1).
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Also known as a power zinc.

The Boomsday Project.name: Goblin Prank
The Boomsday Project.text: Give a friendly minion +3/+3 and Rush. It_dies at end of turn.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: "Ha ha! Glork looks ridiculous! ...Glork? Glork?"

The Boomsday Project.name: Lab Recruiter
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 copies of a friendly minion into your deck.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Join the chemistry lab! We've got all the solutions.

The Boomsday Project.name: Menacing Nimbus
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Add a random Elemental to your hand.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Electra stores her elementals in the cloud.

The Boomsday Project.name: Omega Mind
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, your spells have Lifesteal this turn.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Has a side-business selling her lipstick shade, "Omega Red."

The Boomsday Project.name: Research Project
The Boomsday Project.text: Each player draws 2_cards.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Abstract: Analyzing systemic applications of coldlight data sets vis-a-vis shuffle-related paradigms. Conclusion: Yay, cards!

The Boomsday Project.name: Rocket Boots
The Boomsday Project.text: Give a minion Rush. Draw a card.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: This is the happiest moment of Grik's life. We'll miss him.

The Boomsday Project.name: Spark Engine
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Add a 1/1 Spark with Rush to_your hand.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: He goes by Bzzzzt Aldrin.

The Boomsday Project.name: Toxicologist
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Double-majoring in culinary sciences was definitely a mistake.

The Boomsday Project.name: Unpowered Mauler
The Boomsday Project.text: Can only attack if you cast a spell this turn.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: After a stressful work day it really needs an outlet.

The Boomsday Project.name: Upgradeable Framebot
The Boomsday Project.flavor: *Awesome arm not included.

The Boomsday Project.name: Venomizer
The Boomsday Project.text: Magnetic Poisonous
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Keeps getting banned for toxic behavior.

The Boomsday Project.name: Violet Haze
The Boomsday Project.text: Add 2 random Deathrattle cards to_your hand.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Elite Tauren Chieftain's next hit single.

The Boomsday Project.name: Void Analyst
The Boomsday Project.text: Deathrattle: Give all Demons in your hand +1/+1.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Conclusion: Nothing there.

The Boomsday Project.name: Weapons Project
The Boomsday Project.text:
Each player equips a 2/3 weapon and
gains 6 Armor.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Harrison Jones was kicked off this project.

The Boomsday Project.name: Whirliglider
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/2_Goblin Bomb.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: She's on a bomb voyage.

The Boomsday Project.name: Augmented Elekk
The Boomsday Project.text: Whenever you shuffle a card into a deck, shuffle in_an extra copy.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Her friends call her "Shuffleupugus".

The Boomsday Project.name: Brainstormer
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each spell in your hand.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Her hair was always like that.

The Boomsday Project.name: Bronze Gatekeeper
The Boomsday Project.text: Magnetic Taunt
The Boomsday Project.flavor: "You have my shield! And the rest of me too."

The Boomsday Project.name: Doubling Imp
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: What's worse than finding two imps in your lab? Only finding one of them.

The Boomsday Project.name: Electra Stormsurge
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn casts twice.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: "The coin? You used me for THE COIN!?"

The Boomsday Project.name: Electrowright
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, gain +1/+1.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Carefully assembled from two Electrowrongs.

The Boomsday Project.name: Extra Arms
The Boomsday Project.text:
[x]Give a minion +2/+2.
Add 'More Arms!' to your
hand that gives +2/+2.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: All the better to hug you with!

The Boomsday Project.name: Kaboom Bot
The Boomsday Project.text: Deathrattle: Deal 4_damage to a random enemy minion.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: More Boom for your buck.

The Boomsday Project.name: Landscaping
The Boomsday Project.text: Summon two 2/2 Treants.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: We'll put a happy tree right here... and give him a little friend.

The Boomsday Project.name: Microtech Controller
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Microbots.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Best-selling author of "How to Make Friends You Completely Control."

The Boomsday Project.name: Necrium Blade
The Boomsday Project.text: Deathrattle: Trigger the Deathrattle of a random friendly minion.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Grab death by the handle.

The Boomsday Project.name: Nethersoul Buster
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each damage your hero has taken this turn.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Why did the demon cross the streams? To get to The Other Side.

The Boomsday Project.name: Omega Medic
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, restore #10 Health to your hero.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: She feels waiting for healing makes you appreciate it more.

The Boomsday Project.name: SN1P-SN4P
The Boomsday Project.text: Magnetic, Echo Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Microbots.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: "It's gonna be snip this, snap that. Bada-snip, bada-snap!"

The Boomsday Project.name: Spider Bomb
The Boomsday Project.text: Magnetic Deathrattle: Destroy a random_enemy_minion.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Wrecks a dude, any size. Catches thieves, eats those guys. Look out! Here comes a Spider Bomb!

The Boomsday Project.name: Spring Rocket
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Proper grammar would be "sprung rocket."

The Boomsday Project.name: Stargazer Luna
The Boomsday Project.text:
After you play the
right-most card in your hand, draw a card.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: She's Dr. Boom's right-hand mage.

The Boomsday Project.name: Unexpected Results
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Summon two random $2-Cost minions (improved by Spell Damage).
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Sometimes science is more art than science. A lot of people don’t get that.

The Boomsday Project.name: Academic Espionage
The Boomsday Project.text: Shuffle 10 cards from your opponent's class into your deck. They_cost (1).
The Boomsday Project.flavor: The tenth Pyroblast really felt like overkill.

The Boomsday Project.name: Annoy-o-Module
The Boomsday Project.text: Magnetic Divine Shield Taunt
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Every ten seconds it asks if you want to update.

The Boomsday Project.name: Blightnozzle Crawler
The Boomsday Project.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Ooze with Poisonous and Rush.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: "Well we HAD it contained. Then you went and gave it legs!"

The Boomsday Project.name: Coppertail Imposter
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Gain Stealth until your next turn.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: It was fitting in fine until it gathered nuts and bolts.

The Boomsday Project.name: Cosmic Anomaly
The Boomsday Project.text: Spell Damage +2
The Boomsday Project.flavor:
INGREDIENTS: STAR-STUFF, 
BLUE #1, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS.

The Boomsday Project.name: Explodinator
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/2 Goblin Bombs.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: When it absolutely, positively, has to blow up overnight.

The Boomsday Project.name: Flobbidinous Floop
The Boomsday Project.text: While in your hand, this is a 3/4 copy of the last minion you played.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Of all the scientists, he has the most knowledge (when measured in volume).

The Boomsday Project.name: Harbinger Celestia
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Stealth After your opponent plays a minion, become a copy of it.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: She wanders realities, taking on many forms. One was a unicorn princess.

The Boomsday Project.name: Juicy Psychmelon
The Boomsday Project.text:
Draw a 7, 8, 9, and
10-Cost minion
 from your deck.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: It's not juicy at all. IT'S JUST MESSING WITH YOUR HEAD.

The Boomsday Project.name: Necromechanic
The Boomsday Project.text: Your Deathrattles trigger twice.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: If at first you don't succeed, die, die again.

The Boomsday Project.name: Omega Defender
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, gain +10 Attack.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: "Surrender. You have 10 mana to comply."

The Boomsday Project.name: Piloted Reaper
The Boomsday Project.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random minion from your hand that costs (2) or less.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: New facial recognition systems keep out the Lorewalkers and Doomsayers.

The Boomsday Project.name: Prismatic Lens
The Boomsday Project.text: Draw a minion and a spell from your deck. Swap their Costs.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Mined exclusively from the dark side of the moon.

The Boomsday Project.name: Replicating Menace
The Boomsday Project.text: Magnetic Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Microbots.
The Boomsday Project.flavor:
It's a car!
*Whomp whomp whomp*
It's a robot!
*Whomp whom-CRUNCH*
It's… three.. smaller robots!

The Boomsday Project.name: Steel Rager
The Boomsday Project.text: Rush
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Rage alongside the machine.

The Boomsday Project.name: Storm Chaser
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Draw a spell from your deck that costs_(5) or more.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Best drank after a stiff gale.

The Boomsday Project.name: Thunderhead
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]After you play a card with Overload, summon two 1/1 Sparks with Rush.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Most of his friends are still Metalheads.

The Boomsday Project.name: Weaponized Piñata
The Boomsday Project.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Legendary minion to your_hand.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: It'll be fine.  It's not like they have any reason to hate us.

The Boomsday Project.name: Whizbang the Wonderful
The Boomsday Project.text: You start the game with one of Whizbang's Wonderful Decks!
The Boomsday Project.flavor: From the prestigious Westfall Wonderfuls.

The Boomsday Project.name: Crazed Chemist
The Boomsday Project.text: Combo: Give a friendly minion +4 Attack.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: You don't have to be crazy to work here, but it helps.

The Boomsday Project.name: Dyn-o-matic
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all minions_except_Mechs.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Star player on the inter-office Boomball team.

The Boomsday Project.name: E.M.P. Operative
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Mech.
The Boomsday Project.flavor:
"I said this looks like a job for me
So everybody just follow me
'Cause we need a little E.M.P.
'Cause it feels so mechy without me…"

The Boomsday Project.name: Glowstone Technician
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
The Boomsday Project.flavor:
"Windell! More light!"

"I'm givin' it all she's got, Kangor!"

The Boomsday Project.name: Holomancer
The Boomsday Project.text: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 1/1_copy of it.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Help me, worthy opponent. You're my only hope.

The Boomsday Project.name: Loose Specimen
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split among other friendly minions.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: You leave Deathstalker Rexxar alone in the lab for TWO minutes…

The Boomsday Project.name: Mechano-Egg
The Boomsday Project.text: Deathrattle: Summon an 8/8 Robosaur.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: When you need more iron in your diet.

The Boomsday Project.name: Myra Rotspring
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Deathrattle minion. Also gain its Deathrattle.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: On her first day on the job, Myra removed the smoke detectors.

The Boomsday Project.name: Myra's Unstable Element
The Boomsday Project.text:
Draw the rest of
your deck.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: What could go wrong?

The Boomsday Project.name: Necrium Vial
The Boomsday Project.text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle twice.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Two near-death experiences for the price of one!

The Boomsday Project.name: Omega Agent
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, summon _2 copies of this minion.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: They don't just find the truth. They give it a ten second head start, then hunt it down.

The Boomsday Project.name: Power Word: Replicate
The Boomsday Project.text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 5/5 copy of it.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Available as a bundle, along with Power Words: Detonate, Animate, Annihilate, and Paper Weight.

The Boomsday Project.name: Reckless Experimenter
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Deathrattle minions you play cost (3) less, but die at the end of the turn.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: It's hard to call her reckless when it's clear she knows what she's doing.

The Boomsday Project.name: Rusty Recycler
The Boomsday Project.text: Taunt Lifesteal
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Ironic. It could recycle others, but not itself.

The Boomsday Project.name: Seaforium Bomber
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 5 damage.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Dress for the bomb you want, not the bomb you have.

The Boomsday Project.name: Shrink Ray
The Boomsday Project.text:
Set the Attack and Health of all minions
to 1.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Actually works by enlarging the rest of the world.

The Boomsday Project.name: Subject 9
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Draw 5 different Secrets from your deck.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: The original clever girl.

The Boomsday Project.name: Supercollider
The Boomsday Project.text:
[x]After you attack a minion,
force it to attack one
of its neighbors.
The Boomsday Project.flavor:
Boom's Second Law of Motion:
HIT IT VERY HARD!

The Boomsday Project.name: Wargear
The Boomsday Project.text: Magnetic
The Boomsday Project.flavor: WAR! GEAR! What is it good for?

The Boomsday Project.name: Zilliax
The Boomsday Project.text: Magnetic Divine Shield, Taunt, Lifesteal, Rush
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Everything but the kitchen sink. Oh wait, there's one on his back.
The Boomsday Project.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by purchasing the TITANS Mega Bundle.

The Boomsday Project.name: Arcane Dynamo
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (5) or more.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: We ran out of jars, so we started putting brains in other stuff.

The Boomsday Project.name: Damaged Stegotron
The Boomsday Project.text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Sadly the warranty does not cover fireballs or acts of Boom.

The Boomsday Project.name: Dr. Morrigan
The Boomsday Project.text: Deathrattle: Swap this with a minion from your deck.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: She will NOT STOP until she gets tenure.

The Boomsday Project.name: Ectomancy
The Boomsday Project.text: Summon copies of all Demons you control.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: "Zerek! Stay out of my lab!"

The Boomsday Project.name: Eureka!
The Boomsday Project.text: Summon a copy of_a_random minion from your hand.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Genius is 1% inspiration, and 99% drawing your Deathwing.

The Boomsday Project.name: Giggling Inventor
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and_Divine Shield.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: "I shall build a mighty golden paladin! And he will GREET the WORLD!"

The Boomsday Project.name: Mechanical Whelp
The Boomsday Project.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Mechanical Dragon.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: "Well if I didn't build the whelp and YOU didn't build the whelp…"

The Boomsday Project.name: Meteorologist
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: For each card in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Some say the world will end in fire. Some say in ice. Why not BOTH?

The Boomsday Project.name: Missile Launcher
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Magnetic At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other characters.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: We asked, "Where do the missiles go?" and he answered, "Yes."

The Boomsday Project.name: Security Rover
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/3 Mech with Taunt.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Insecurity detected. Alerting hugbots.

The Boomsday Project.name: Spark Drill
The Boomsday Project.text: Rush Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Sparks with Rush to your hand.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Preferred weapon of Dr. Boom's orthodontist.

The Boomsday Project.name: Tending Tauren
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Choose One - Give your other minions +1/+1; or Summon two 2/2 Treants.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: That racial bonus to Herbalism finally paid off.

The Boomsday Project.name: The Storm Bringer
The Boomsday Project.text: Transform your minions into random Legendary minions.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Finally, Electra can work from home.

The Boomsday Project.name: Zerek, Master Cloner
The Boomsday Project.text: Deathrattle: If you've cast any spells on this minion, resummon it.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: His original name was Aerek. Then the first clone was Berek. They went evil around Merek.

The Boomsday Project.name: Astromancer
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random minion with Cost equal to your hand size.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: All signs point to Antonidas.

The Boomsday Project.name: Beryllium Nullifier
The Boomsday Project.text: Magnetic Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Why Beryllium? Because it's hard to spell.

The Boomsday Project.name: Boommaster Flark
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Summon four 0/2 Goblin Bombs.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Every good plan requires a bit of patience. And a lot of explosives.

The Boomsday Project.name: Dr. Boom, Mad Genius
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Mechs have Rush.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: "Of course I've gone mad with power. Ever try going mad without it?"

The Boomsday Project.name: Dreampetal Florist
The Boomsday Project.text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (7).
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Unlike gnomes, dreampetals grow more than 3 feet tall.

The Boomsday Project.name: Flark's Boom-Zooka
The Boomsday Project.text:
[x]Summon 3 minions from
your deck. They attack
enemy minions, then die.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: It used to be a Ba-zooka but we ran out of sheep.

The Boomsday Project.name: Gloop Sprayer
The Boomsday Project.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of each adjacent minion.
The Boomsday Project.flavor:
"Are you sure that's enough gloop?"

"Hold on."

The Boomsday Project.name: Kangor's Endless Army
The Boomsday Project.text: Resurrect 3 friendly Mechs. They keep any Magnetic upgrades.
The Boomsday Project.flavor:
"That's three, Kangor. Three isn't endless."
- Countess Ashmore

The Boomsday Project.name: Luna's Pocket Galaxy
The Boomsday Project.text:
Change the Cost of minions in your
deck to (1).
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Luna became head of the astronomy department when her boss invented the Pocket Black Hole.

The Boomsday Project.name: Star Aligner
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control 3 minions with 7 Health, deal 7 damage to all enemies.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: "You're a Sagittarius? Me too! Just gimme a sec."

The Boomsday Project.name: Bull Dozer
The Boomsday Project.text: Divine Shield
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Leave them alone for two minutes and they go right into sleep mode.

The Boomsday Project.name: Mulchmuncher
The Boomsday Project.text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each friendly Treant that died this game.
The Boomsday Project.flavor:
The latest advancement in
hippo-botany.

The Boomsday Project.name: The Boomship
The Boomsday Project.text: Summon 3 random minions from your hand. Give them Rush.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Dr. Boom ends his motivational speeches by dropping the mechs.

The Boomsday Project.name: Zerek's Cloning Gallery
The Boomsday Project.text: Summon a 1/1 copy of_each minion in your_deck.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: Cloning can be a jarring experience.

The Boomsday Project.name: Mecha'thun
The Boomsday Project.text: [x]Deathrattle: If you have no cards in your deck, hand, and battlefield, destroy the enemy hero.
The Boomsday Project.flavor: "Your software will fail. Your users will abandon you. You are already obsolete."
